snippet: With North American auto sales up significantly in the first quarter, there will be renewed optimism evident among automakers at this year’s New York auto show.
abstract: Surge in number of high-profile vehicles to be introduced at New York auto show is indicative of rebirth of North American automobile market and renewed optimism among automakers.
lead_paragraph: With North American auto sales up significantly in the first quarter, there will be renewed optimism evident among automakers at this year’s New York auto show.

headline.seo: Auto Show: Brighter Skies and a Flying Car, Too
headline.main: Brighter Skies and a Flying Car, Too
headline.print_headline: NEW YORK AUTO SHOW; Brighter Skies and a Flying Car, Too
